document_data.name: Vesarius
document_data.mainbody: '''Vesarius''' was a [[cornugon]] lieutenant in [[Dragonspear Castle]] circa the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Vesarius was a very brutal commander and believed [[Vooka]] and [[Vrag]] to be worthless inferiors.
document_data.History:
In the past, Vesarius made a bargain with the ancient [[black dragon]] [[Maelestor Rex]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1363}}, Vesarius led one of the [[Hordes of Dragonspear]], specifically [[the Storm]], a group composed of 100 [[bugbear]]s and 100 [[ogre]]s, plus Maelestor Rex.
